scripts.patch-manifest-for-firefox: cp dist/manifest.json dist/manifest_.json && jq -s -c '(.[0] * .[1]) | (.background.scripts = [.background.service_worker]) | (del(.background.service_worker))' dist/manifest_.json src/manifest.firefox.json > dist/manifest.json && rm dist/manifest_.json
scripts.package:chrome: rm -rf dist && yarn run build && web-ext build --overwrite-dest --source-dir dist --filename chrome.zip
scripts.package:firefox-debug: rm -rf dist && yarn run build && yarn run patch-manifest-for-firefox && web-ext build --overwrite-dest --source-dir dist --filename firefox-debug.zip
scripts.package:firefox-release-unlisted: rm -rf dist && yarn run build && yarn run patch-manifest-for-firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir dist --use-submission-api --channel=unlisted --api-key=$AMO_JWT_ISSUER --api-secret=$AMO_JWT_SECRET
scripts.package:firefox-release-listed: rm -rf dist && yarn run build && yarn run patch-manifest-for-firefox && web-ext sign --source-dir dist --use-submission-api --channel=listed --api-key=$AMO_JWT_ISSUER --api-secret=$AMO_JWT_SECRET
